name: Sky Cafe
description:
You're the sole employee of the Sky Cafe.

It's lunch hour and you have to deal with the customers from the local art institute.

Bring them coffee. Don't forget to bring them the right coffee.

HOW TO POUR THE COFFEE:

- Press E on the mug.

- Place the mug in the machine and press E.

- Press the button once to pour a single unit of that ingredient.

NOTES:

- You're a coffee shop employee so you don't know how to spell. The names on the orders will be different from the names above the characters.

CREDITS:

Programming and Design: Alix Ollivier

Model for Bear, Mug, Clouds, and Island: Philippe Ollivier

Animation for bears: Daniel Liu

Song Credit:

'Song Title (s)''
